Alex Trebek Raps Kanye, Drake, Kendrick Lamar Lyrics on â€œJeopardy!â€: Watch Along with Lil Wayneâ€™s â€œ6 Foot 7 Footâ€ and Desiignerâ€™s â€œPandaâ€ Kanye (Michael Loccisano/Getty Images), Trebek (Ben Hider/Getty Images), Drake (Chris McKay/Getty Images), 
A category on tonightâ€™s â€œJeopardy!,â€ which is in the middle of its collegiate tournament, was called â€œLetâ€™s Rap Kids!â€ and featured rap lyrics to some recent hits. That meant that host Alex Trebek was forced to recited the lyrics to Drakeâ€™s â€œStarted From The Bottom,â€ Kanye Westâ€™s â€œFamous,â€ Lil Wayneâ€™s â€œ6 Foot 7 Foot,â€ Kendrick Lamarâ€™s â€œm.A.A.d. City,â€ and Desiignerâ€™s â€œPanda. Watch clips from the episode below. At this point, Trebek is no stranger to rapping on the show. He previously rapped Drakeâ€™s part of â€œJumpman,â€ from the Future collab What a Time to Be Alive . Last year, â€œJeopardy!â€ referenced Sleater-Kinney , Kanye West , Foo Fighters , Prince, Questlove, A$AP Rocky , Kurt Vile , and the Flaming Lips .
